attributes.action: punish the BBC and not Jonathan Ross and Russell Brand for the events of october 18th
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we feel that although mr ross and mr brand's comments were innapropriate, all blame should lay with the BBC as the show was PRE-RECORDED and yet they didn't do anything until the media kicked up a fuss, using Brand and Ross as scapegoats.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
